title: AT&T Enhanced Push-to-Talk Service for Public Safety
promo_image_alt: Learn more about Enhanced Push to Talk
body:
Expand two-way radio coverage and capacity with fast, responsive, cost-effective push-to-talk

AT&T Enhanced Push-to-Talk is an IP-based end-to-end communications and applications platform that offers fast performance, sub-second call setup, advanced features, a broad portfolio of compatible smartphone and rugged phone devices on the nation’s largest 4G network and compatible Wi-Fi networks. EPTT also increases safety and performance by allowing supervisors to override PTT calls and communicate important, time-sensitive messages to their teams. Communicate with Land Mobile Radio (LMR) and other external PTT networks through the optional Interoperability feature. You can also create lists of up to 1,000 contacts, share information on group calls of up to 250 public safety professionals and much more.

title: Business Messaging from AT&T
promo_description: Reach an entire group of first responders simultaneously
body:
A powerful and highly secure internal communication platform for Public Safety

Keep the lines of instant communication open with Business Messaging from AT&T - a powerful and highly secure group notification platform for government workers and First responders:

  • Supports 1:1 messaging or group messaging to groups as large as 20,000 users
  • Longer messages: broadcast notifications and mission critical information using messages up to 1,000 characters long. Share attachments including voice memos, locations and contacts.
  • Delivery confirmations include sent, delivered and read.
  • Compatible with any device capable of receiving a text message: use the native Messaging app or the optional Business Messenger app (on Android and iOS handsets and tablets) for maximum capacity and enhanced features such as secure messaging.
  • Integrates easily with automation and notification software, or use the Business Notification Center website for group notifications and managing the corporate address book
  • Includes a secure messaging option (via the Business Messenger app) for encrypted messages and security features to support compliance and security requirements.

title: Box from AT&T
promo_description: Store share and access information with security
body:
Simple, highly-secure storing and sharing

Box from AT&T offers completely private, end-to-end content management that is simple, highly-secure, and provides higher performance for a customer’s wireline and mobility endpoints. 

Box allows public safety agencies and personnel to store, share, protect, and govern all of your work in one place. It is more than “file sync and share” - Box is cloud content management that offers compliance, data protection policies, workflow automation, and governance.

Box with NetBond® integrates your AT&T MPLS VPN network which delivers higher quality of service and network security, as compared to the public internet.

title: Mobile Forms from AT&T
promo_description: Mobilize reports, citations, timesheets, or any custom form
body:
Mobilize any reports, citations, timesheets or any custom form to save time and reduce errors.

Time-consuming information capture and manual data entry can impede your agency’s ability to protect your community. Mobile Forms enables rapid, error-free data collection with mobile devices—saving time as well as enhancing accuracy and safety. Customize data fields to your needs and generate near real-time reports with rich data, including signatures, photos, barcodes and more. Let public safety professionals complete forms on the job, then send and share data in real time.

title: AT&T Workforce Manager
body:
Empower productivity and strengthen dispatcher communications

Cloud-based Workforce Manager from AT&T is a flexible all-in-one

productivity solution that helps improves efficiency across your agency. Collect information and create, prepare and share reports in a highly secure manner from mobile handsets and tablets. Complete incident reports then quickly send and share them securely. With near real-time location status of all agency personnel, you can make faster, more informed decisions. Provides dispatching, timekeeping, and messaging capability and integrates with Enhanced Push-to-Talk.

title: Fleet Complete from AT&T
promo_description: Track and communicate with agencies, vehicles, and assets
body:
Track and communicate with first responder agencies, vehicles and assets in near real-time

The AT&T Fleet Complete suite (Fleet Tracker, Asset Tracker & Action Tracker) is a GPS-based tracking and management solution that provides near real-time visibility of your first responder fleet vehicle location data and their vehicle diagnostics data to agency command centers. Ideal to deploy and re-route vehicles and public safety professionals “closest to” and “on-the-fly.” Advanced tracking, monitoring and communication help improve response times as well as the safety of communities and first responders alike. AT&T Fleet Complete with the AT&T Enhanced Push-to-Talk option enables mobile voice dispatch operations direct from the command centers management console to first responders.

title: AirWatch Solutions from AT&T
promo_description: Secure any device on the FirstNet network-simply
body:
Make your devices highly secure on the FirstNet network

AirWatch makes Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) simple on a single platform. Now, from the back-office to the street, you can manage applications, content and email and make them highly secure across agency-owned devices, BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) and your workspace. Empower first responders with an industry-leading solution that keeps identities highly secure and enhances collaboration for greater efficiency and productivity.

title: MobileIron from AT&T
body:
Make your mobile devices highly secure and more agile

With comprehensive security, mobile application management and mobile content management capabilities, MobileIron helps agencies and first responders perform smarter, faster and with greater collaboration. Scalable, cost-effective, easily integrated and packed with comprehensive security features, IT managers now have the tools to manage the lifecycle of mobile devices and their applications from end to end.

title: IBM MaaS360 from AT&T
promo_description: Empower greater security for sensitive agency communications
body:
Empower greater security for sensitive agency communications

Built for the way first responders work and collaborate today, IBM MaaS360 has redefined mobile security and productivity for public safety agencies. With one solution, you can manage your entire mobile device fleet, make emails, apps & docs highly secure, reduce security & compliance risks and control your entire mobile IT environment. MaaS360 supports BYOD (Bring Your Own Device), separates work and personal data on mobile devices, keeps pace with rapid OS and mobile platform updates and offers many other benefits as well.

title: Private Mobile Connection
promo_description: Avoid the internet and the risks that come with it
promo_image_alt: Learn more about Private Mobile Connection
body:
Avoid the internet and the risks that come with it.

Mobilizing your network means location becomes irrelevant, it also means that machine-to-machine technology can be within its reach. But are internet-based solutions secure enough for your critical public safety applications and data?

title: Netbond for Cloud
promo_description: Use the cloud without the dangers of the internet
promo_image_alt: Learn more about Netbond for Cloud
body:
Use the cloud without the dangers of the internet

Want to scale with the cloud, but worry about putting sensitive public safety applications and data over the internet?

AT&T NetBond for Cloud is a cloud networking solution that "bonds" our ecosystem of cloud service providers to your AT&T MPLS VPN, helping you avoid the internet and the risks that come with it. This means that you can reap the benefits of the cloud with the peace of mind that comes with a private network.

With AT&T NetBond for Cloud, you can connect within minutes, view usage reports and control your monthly usage expenses via the AT&T Cloud Portal.

title: NetMotion
body:
Public safety grade reliability and security

When seconds count, application persistence is vital, because losing your work at the wrong moment can have major consequences.

With NetMotion Mobility from AT&T, you get a reliable and FIPS compliant VPN connection to critical public safety applications that automatically pauses and resumes activity when traveling in between networks, without losing your applications or what's on them.

title: AT&T Cloud Storage
body:
Expand on-demand

Never run out of storage space again. AT&T Cloud Storage is a cloud-based storage solution that easily scales up and down to any size you need. It provides elastic capacity on demand and allows access to your stored data from virtually anywhere and at any time. Pay only for the storage you use or contract for a certain amount of storage - you choose.

title: AT&T Virtual Data Center Services
promo_image_alt: Learn more about AT&amp;T Virtual Data Center Services
body:
Enable business agility and scale with confidence

Turnkey managed infrastructure with full-featured management options based on the needs of your applications. Choose from an enterprise shared infrastructure or a fully dedicated platform to support more intense workloads.

  • True business continuity hosted across multiple AT&T Data Centers
  • Simple and competitively priced - priced per user or per application
  • Managed storage and application monitoring options available
  • Supported by 24x7x365 Help Desk

title: IBM Bluemix®
promo_description: Deliver public safety agency value with applications, infrastructure, and services
body:
IBM BLUEMIX®, an industry-leading cloud platform that helps you solve real problems and drive business value with applications, infrastructure and services.

AT&T offers BLUEMIX®products and services including bare metal and virtual servers accompanied by a menu of complementary services such as security, storage, monitoring and software options.

*Bluemix is a registered trademark of IBM in the United States and other countries and is used under license. IBM responsibility is limited to IBM products and services and is governed solely by the agreements under which such products and services are provided.

title: AT&T Content Delivery Network
promo_description: Keep your team informed with reliable access to high-quality media
promo_image_alt: Learn more about AT&amp;T Content Delivery Network
body:
Keep customers engaged with reliable access to high-quality media.

AT&T Content Delivery Network (CDN) Service gives you the bandwidth, flexibility and control you need to deliver digital assets quickly and more securely. AT&T CDN Service enable you to:

  • Accelerate via front-end optimization
  • Improve load times of dynamically loaded content
  • Accommodate spikes in traffic, without purchasing additional infrastructure.
